sentences.english: Treatment strategies of IM were antiviral and symptomatically therapy.
sentences.chinese: 本組治療以抗病毒和對症治療爲主。

sentences.english: Interferons (IFN) belong to the family of antivirus proteins, which can inhibit some viruses proliferation.
sentences.chinese: 干擾素是一類抗病毒蛋白，它可阻止另一種病毒增殖。

sentences.english: Anti-viral agents were stopped according to the recommendations of the Asian Pacific Association for the Study of the Liver.
sentences.chinese: 根據亞洲太平洋肝臟研究協會的建議停止抗病毒藥物。

sentences.english: Why are there so few effective antivirals?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼有效的抗病毒藥物那麼少呢？

sentences.english: Overusing antiviral drugs can help germs become resistant to them.
sentences.chinese: 過度使用抗病毒藥會幫助病菌產生抗藥性。

sentences.english: To define the antiviral activity of M. domestica larva hemolymph.
sentences.chinese: 目的確定家蠅幼蟲血淋巴的抗病毒作用。

sentences.english: The research progress in the prodrugs of antiviral drugs are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 本文對抗病毒前體藥物研究進展作介紹。

sentences.english: His job is just to dispense ARV drugs from the local Empilisweni hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作是在安培斯文尼當地的醫院分發抗病毒藥物。

sentences.english: Both antivirals and vaccines have important roles in treatment and prevention respectively.
sentences.chinese: 抗病毒藥物和疫苗可在治療和預防領域發揮重要作用。

sentences.english: Objective To test the anti-virus effect of inner silvered fiber and the influencing factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究內鍍銀纖維抗病毒性能及其影響因素。

sentences.english: In general, WHO does not recommend the use of antiviral drugs for prophylactic purposes.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，世衛組織不建議使用抗病毒藥物進行預防。

sentences.english: Indigowoad root is one of a few well-recognized anti-virus traditional herbs at present time.
sentences.chinese: 板藍根是目前公認的具有抗病毒作用的少數中藥之一。

sentences.english: Surfaces should be cleaned with broad spectrum disinfectants of proven antiviral activity.
sentences.chinese: 表面應用具抗病毒效用的廣效殺菌劑清潔。

sentences.english: How much adherence is required for ARVs to be effective?
sentences.chinese: 需要怎樣的依從性才能使抗病毒藥物有效？

sentences.english: Flavone is an important compound with good efficiency on antioxidant, antibacterial, antivirus.
sentences.chinese: 黃酮是一類具有抗炎，抗菌，抗病毒等作用的化合物。

sentences.english: Isatis-Root extract powder is active against virus.
sentences.chinese: 板藍根浸膏粉有抗病毒作用。
